name: National Museum of The Gambia
description: A key place to learn about Gambian history, culture, and heritage artifacts.

name: Albert Market
description: A lively market for crafts, fabrics, food, and everyday life in the capital.

name: Katchikally Crocodile Pool
description: A sacred site known for its crocodile pool and traditional rituals.

name: Arch 22
description: An iconic monument offering panoramic views of Banjul and its surroundings.

name: Tanji Fishing Village
description: A vibrant coastal village known for traditional fishing practices and daily fish markets.

name: River Gambia National Park
description: A protected area showcasing wildlife, river ecosystems, and cultural heritage.
